content: will be published for **free** on the oh la lana blog pdf entry $4 for those who prefer to knit offline a downloadable pdf version will be available here in my ravelry store every time a clue is released you will receive a notification to download the new pattern > note pattern club+ members receive > this as part of their membership at no > extra cost stay updated join the newsletter follow on instagram or check the summary page in oh la lana for weekly release alerts
